body_html:
CUDA is either missing or not in your path. You will also need cuDNN. I suggest the following:

Install the most recent version of TensorFlow for GPU with pip install tensorflow-gpu or following one of the other methods on this page. The page also has instructions for installing CUDA.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux. Note that recent versions of TensorFlow use CUDA 9.0 and CUDA 1.0.1 used CUDA 8.0

body:
CUDA is either missing or not in your path.  You will also need cuDNN.  I suggest the following:

Install the most recent version of TensorFlow for GPU with `pip install tensorflow-gpu`  or following one of the other methods on this page.  The page also has instructions for installing CUDA.  
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux.  Note that recent versions of TensorFlow use CUDA 9.0 and CUDA 1.0.1 used CUDA 8.0
